patthana15.25:1.1_0: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa dhammassa
patthana15.25:1.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo naahetukassa ceva
patthana15.25:1.1_2: nana ca hetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko
patthana15.25:1.1_3: ca kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa ca naahetukassa ceva
patthana15.25:1.1_4: nana ca hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.25:2.1_0: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo naahetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa
patthana15.25:2.1_1: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa
patthana15.25:2.1_2: ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Sahetuko ceva
patthana15.25:2.1_3: na ca hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca nakusalassa ca naahetukassa
patthana15.25:2.1_4: ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.25:3.1_0: Hetu ceva sahetuko kusalo ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa
patthana15.25:3.1_1: ceva naahetukassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko
patthana15.25:3.1_2: kusalo ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā naahetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa
patthana15.25:3.1_3: nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ceva sahetuko kusalo ca sahetuko
patthana15.25:3.1_4: ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa ceva naahetukassa nakusalassa ca naahetukassa
patthana15.25:3.1_5: ceva nana hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.25:4.1: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye natthiyā vigate nava.
patthana15.25:5.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa naakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Etena upāyena nava pañhā kātabbā.)
patthana15.25:6.1: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare upanissaye natthiyā vigate nava.
patthana15.25:7.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo nahetussa ceva naahetukassa ca naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Nava pañhā kātabbā.)
patthana15.25:8.1: Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Hetuhetusampayuttadukaṁ hetusahetukadukasadisaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ. Nava pañhā.)
